name: The Coldest War
description:
In a universe where war has ravaged, the world has been divided between Red and Blue, leading to a stalemate, where the war now takes place in orbit!

The Coldest War is a Two-Player turn-based fast-action game where you use Worms-like rocket physics around a planet to take out your opponents' Space Station.

The game is playable with Keyboard/Controllers using Unity's Launcher, where it includes mouse/touch controls, downloadable for Windows or for Android.

Made as part of the Brains Eden Jam by the team from University of Bedfordshire.
